attributes.action: make concessionery travel available to all disability living allowance recipants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because I receive the lower DLA catagory I have been informed that I am no longer entitled to concessionary fares on the ferries, trains and buses

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Department of Work and Pensions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
